description: Advanced planter monitor with row-by-row diagnostics and mapping
key_features: Row-by-row population - singulation - speed - skip/double - ride quality - mapping

description: Electric-driven seed tube for precise delivery at any planting speed
key_features: Electric belt delivery - eliminates bounce - maintains singulation above 8 mph

description: Electric vacuum meter with individual row shutoff and variable rate
key_features: 98.5%+ singulation - electric drive - variable rate - individual shutoff

description: Electric row unit drive replacing mechanical chain/shaft drive
key_features: Individual row electric drive - variable rate by row - multi-hybrid capable

description: Hydraulic active downforce with real-time row-by-row load sensing
key_features: Active hydraulic - row-by-row - eliminates compaction from excess force

description: Automated seed depth control adjusting for changing soil conditions
key_features: Electric actuator - automatic depth adjustment by row - soil condition sensing

description: Hydraulic row cleaner with auto down-pressure adjustment
key_features: Hydraulic auto-adjust - clears residue without moving soil

description: Dual-action closing system with independent closing pressure
key_features: Dual closing wheels - independent pressure - eliminates sidewall compaction

description: In-furrow and 2x2 liquid fertilizer placement system
key_features: Three-outlet placement - in-furrow + dual 2x2 - variable rate

description: In-furrow blade pressing seeds into moisture
equipment_compatibility: Universal - JD / Kinze / Case IH / any planter with standard row units
key_features: Mechanical firmer - ensures seed-to-moisture contact - reduces floaters

description: In-furrow firmer with organic matter and moisture sensors
key_features: Firmer + real-time OM and moisture mapping - enables prescription VRS

description: High-frequency seed sensor for accurate spacing measurement
key_features: Radar seed sensor - accurate at any speed - no dust interference

description: Accelerometer sensor monitoring planter bounce and ride dynamics
key_features: Real-time bounce detection - alerts operator to slow down - maps ride quality

description: Wireless data platform for field-to-office planting data sync
key_features: Wireless prescription download - as-planted upload - fleet visibility

description: High-definition variable rate liquid fertilizer control per row
key_features: Per-row variable rate liquid - servo valve - prescription-driven

description: Multi-hybrid planting system allowing different varieties by zone
key_features: Two seed meters per row - prescription hybrid switching - variable rate
